item.title: By: Anton Volt
item.dc:creator: Anton Volt
item.description: Isn't it generally considered terrible practice to set state with props? Maybe change that one example as not to introduce bad practices to all the new people trying react
item.content:encoded: Isn’t it generally considered terrible practice to set state with props? Maybe change that one example as not to introduce bad practices to all the new people trying react
